text: David Stewart (born 1874) was a Scottish footballer who played as a defender. ==Career== Born in Glasgow, Stewart played club football for Queen's Park, and made two appearances for Scotland. He later moved to London. ==References== Category:1874 births Category:Year of death missing Category:Scottish footballers Category:Scotland international footballers Category:Queen's Park F.C. players Category:Association football defenders Category:Date of birth missing Category:Place of death missing
title: David Stewart (footballer, born 1874)
